website_summaries.verdict: Between its ability to distinguish between metals, ergonomic design, and range of helpful features, this is the best metal detector for beginners.
pros: Pinpoint Mode identifies the exact location of discoveries
Trio of audio tones denote type of metal found
cons: Not the best model for scanning especially deeply into soil

customer_reviews.title: Great for a novice
customer_reviews.text: As a pure novice, this detector has been awesome. I may not know what I'm missing with a much more expensive machine, but learning this unit has been a snap and very productive. I am extremely confident with it compared to other similarly priced models I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Krautmann

customer_reviews.title: One of the best
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic machine! Found coins, rings, even picked up an old coffee can buried 16" deep! Would put this up against detectors costing hundreds more, any day. Love the fact it can run forever on a single battery, too. Easy to use, from 'turn on and go' to using the discrimination and notching, it also has the pinpoint feature. Very lightweight, can use it all day and not get tired. Best detector I've ever had!
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: A new addiction!
customer_reviews.text: I know nothinng about metal detectors so this must have been a good choice. The setup and controls are very intuitive. It's also super light 8 year old flipping loves walking around the woods with this thing. The battery life also seem incredible. I cant wait for summer time to come so we can do so more serious hunting.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This works exactly like it says, great product for the price. This is the first metal detector I have ever bought and it is definitely user friendly. The built in pin pointer is a huge plus! I found so much stuff my first time out playing around with this... Definitely has become a hobby over the last few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Wright

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: For the money you can't beat it. With feachers of much more expensive models. I love this thing!!
customer_reviews.author: Dale Fritson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the 'notch out' of certain metals (like tin cans, pop tops).
customer_reviews.author: Mik3h686

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to check fit
customer_reviews.text: This has a well documented highly rated record of precision and accuracy. I do not doubt it. For my particular body issues it was never comfortable so I never tried to turn it on. This is a company well known and puts out great quality items. This one just didn't fit me. Not Manufacture's fault
customer_reviews.author: Kneelzsteex

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great just started metal detecting. Grandson and I having a blast
customer_reviews.author: daniel rousseau

customer_reviews.title: Found money right out of the gates!
customer_reviews.text: The set up was a bit intense, but once done, the metal detecting part of this journey has been so fun! Found a lot of aluminum foil, but I actually found money on my first outing (not quite enough to pay for it, but give me time)! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sparkle Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Mine is still working 3 years later
customer_reviews.text: I have been going out several years with this metal detector. It works pretty good at finding things.. I dig up everything not just when it dings for precious metals. The padding seems to have gotten a little brittle, but other than that it still works perfectly. Fairly easy to use and it feels pretty light in the hand. It has very good battery life and easy to read,
customer_reviews.author: Cage

customer_reviews.title: Arrived non working.  Very short return period.
customer_reviews.text: Item never worked from the second it was opened. I do not recommend. Since this was a gift I bought it early and the return window closed on me so I'm stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Present
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my husband. He has brought it out a few times since Christmas and loves it. I have to say it is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: jurive

customer_reviews.title: Great metal detector
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Mom and she said it’s great
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Bounty buster
customer_reviews.text: So far its winter an weather bound, but looking forward to spring. It has surprised us with its depth deetection.
customer_reviews.author: Manufacturer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to write home about.
customer_reviews.text: Great air tests, but extremely poor depth in real soil. I had to quickly upgrade to a Teknetics T2. Near zero resale value.
customer_reviews.author: N. Spence

customer_reviews.title: This is a dirt assassin!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I recieved this a few days ago and set it up. Just now me an my daughter (2.5yrs old) went out and scanned the lawn, found numerous can pieces , piece of a diecast car a quarter and a penny in about 20 min. Its easy to tell if you want to dig with the pin point function. I'm super happy with this. I've owned the BH discovery before and figured that this would be a good upgrade. It super sensitive and the pinpoint function is priceless. Locate, pinpoint, dig, and hand pin point. its that easy. Note to self ....any finds with the daughter then legally become her property......lol
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Gutmann

customer_reviews.title: made in china... metal detector that does ...
customer_reviews.text: made in china... metal detector that does not detect a coin to about 5 inches in the ground .. This metal detector bounty hunter is made in china no u.s.a
customer_reviews.author: antonio

customer_reviews.title: does not power on
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box installed new battery just purchased for this. would not power up long enough to set any of the control functions. power on touched menu button it shut of immediately. Could not get it to stay on nothing worked as per the enclosed instructions. Cheap made for the price, do not buy this item, all plastic including the coil mounting ears....
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Lacy

customer_reviews.title: The new Bounty Hunter Pros are perfect for new and learned detectorists.
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with the newer Bounty Hunter Pros. This machine detects deeper than most detectors I have had in the past ten years. About 9" in my soil. Fast recovery rate, out performing my Fisher F2 and much faster than the Ace 250. Pinpointing is right on, and with the 10" elliptical coil it's a great deal. I bought the Land Ranger Pro as well, for it's many abilities plus ground balance. The new Pros are very light to swing, but still sturdy. I can just switch out rods with coils between the two now. First Texas did a great job on providing excellent bang for the buck with this line.
customer_reviews.author: Danny M. Lightfoot

customer_reviews.title: Great metal detector.
customer_reviews.text: So far very impressed with this guy. My son and I searched just around the yard and it found coins as deep as about a foot. We cancelled out all other metal but still it picked up a crushed tin can down to about a foot in this mode. That was the only time it did this. It works great we found some old coins and we are letting them soak to see what they may be. I think one may be silver. In any event we are liking this metal detector. Recommend this one but it is pricy.
customer_reviews.author: Donald G. Morse

customer_reviews.title: excellant value
customer_reviews.text: very accurate, easy to use, light weight, may sit easy for longer searching periods.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: It will tell you it’s finding coins and you dig 6” and there’s an awesome beer can
customer_reviews.text: If you want to find old beer cans then this is the detector for you. It will tell you it’s finding coins and you dig 6” and there’s an awesome beer can. Spend a little more and get a better unit.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Harwell
